title: Mini-Ep 73: Toners and Tribulations
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 73: Toners and Tribulations
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree hear from a listener living a real-life cozy mystery, get a few exfoliant reccs, discuss scar remedies, and answer the age old question: WTF is toner? Plus they reminisce about old tween clothing stores and their favorite mall shops of y...
description:
Kate and Doree hear from a listener living a real-life cozy mystery, get a few exfoliant reccs, discuss scar remedies, and answer the age old question: WTF is toner? Plus they reminisce about old tween clothing stores and their favorite mall shops of yesteryear.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • The Vagina Bible - You can purchase THE VAGINA BIBLE from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca.
  • Pretty Litter - Get 20% off your first order when you go to prettylitter.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Birchbox - Visit birchbox.com/forever35 and enter promo code FOREVER35 to get $5 off your first box.
  • Away - Get $20 off a suitcase when you visit awaytravel.com/serums and use promo code serums at checkout.
  • Joybird - Visit joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order when you use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
